Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute near 119th/Marshfield
ShortDescription: #119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near 119th/Marshfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near 119th/Marshfield.

Eastbound buses will operate via 119th, Vincennes, 115th, Marshfield, 119th, then resume their normal route.

Westbound buses will operate via 119th, Ashland, 115th, Vincennes, 119th, then resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Westbound Reroute near 71st/Lawndale
ShortDescription: Westbound #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Kedzie, Marquette, Pulaski, and 71st, due to a street blockage near 71st/Lawndale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Kedzie, Marquette, Pulaski, and 71st, due to a street blockage near 71st/Lawndale.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Southbound Reroute near Halsted/87th
ShortDescription: Southbound 8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Summit, Vincennes, 95th and Halsted due to, street blockage near Halsted/87th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Summit, Vincennes, 95th and Halsted due to, street blockage near Halsted/87th. 

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Experiencing Delays; between Pulaski and Cicero
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line service continue to run with significant delays due to track conditions at Pulaski and Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line service continue to run with significant delays due to track conditions at Pulaski and Cicero.

Trains, in both directions, are running on the same track between Pulaski and Cicero stations.

Board/exit all trains on the O'Hare-bound platform at stations.

Also, consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

We're working to restore normal service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier raised bridge over the Chicago River. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier raised bridge over the Chicago River.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green and Pink Line Service Experiencing Significant Delays Due to Raised Bridge
ShortDescription: Green and Pink Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green and Pink Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown.

Some trains may be either held or rerouted before reaching the bridge in order to maintain service across the remainder of the route. Listen for announcements and check train destination signs when boarding.

We apologize for this temporary inconvenience and appreciate your patience while the Chicago Department of Transportation works to complete the bridge operation. Allow extra travel time.
